properties.description: Open from 01-11-2022. We are opening on Wednesdays, not to lend books, but to open a warm friendly safe space for people to meet, have a chat and a hot drink. Activities and events will be scheduled on Wednesdays shortly. A warm welcome is always available Mon to Fri.
